results.content: I am really happy I was able to take this course. It was well thought out and clearly presented. David provided solid examples that are easy to build upon. He gave me the information I needed to get setup and running with Visual Studio Code. It gave me the highlights and the backbone I needed to move forward in learning Tailwind CSS. I am more than happy I took this course and give it a solid 5 stars because it covers a lot a ground in a short amount of time. Thanks David
